text: @JoeBiden Make a video on wearing a mask, distancing and using a hand sanitizer can save lives and restart the economy the right way...don’t forget to mention to continue these COVID19 safety protocols until there are no more cases of infection...Vice President Biden please lead Americans!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
